::KitKat::

She pulled back and looked at LAnd Mine and gently wiped the tears 
off of Land Mine's face.  She smiled. "Time Bomb is with the matrix.  
He is now away from the pain and worries of this life.  COmpared to 
us, he is lucky." She smiled. "Now go your room and get some rest.  I 
shall need your help tomorrow." She hugged Land Mine one more time, 
then walked down the hallway after Drillbit.

She caught up with him and smiled.  "OH this sub-commander had a 
few "assets" of her own."  She walked up behind him and hugged him. 
She kissed the back of his neck.  She whispered to him," and just 
wouldn't you like to know what that is?"  She smiled and walked to 
her room, waving her tail as she walked.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit looked around at all the damage.
> "We should all get some rest. We have a few hard days." He said.
> He starts to walk to his room, but stops behind KitKat.
> "I wounder what "assets" the new sub-commander has, hmmm?" He says,
> walking off to his room.
